summary: Implements a Home Assistant TTS platform that communicates with a MaryTTS server to synthesize speech. It defines configuration schema, default parameters, and an asynchronous provider that sends text to the service, retrieves audio data, and reports supported languages and codecs.
business_intent: Allow Home Assistant users to generate spoken notifications and alerts using the external MaryTTS speech synthesis engine, configurable via host, port, language, voice, and codec settings.
